title: Forbes ranking of the 10 richest people in Italy 2019
summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The difference of Wealth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 21.1.
min_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
mid_summary: This is a bar chart. It shows Wealth in billion U.S. dollars for 10 number of Months.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
The difference of Wealth in billion U.S. dollars between the highest and lowest Month is 21.1.
max_summary: This bar chart has 10 columns on the x axis representing Month, and Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in each Month on the y axis.
The Wealth in billion U.S. dollars is highest at Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and lowest at Month Ennio Doris.
There is a difference of 21.1 between the maximum Month Leonardo Del Vecchio and minimum Month Ennio Doris.
Month Leonardo Del Vecchio is higher than any other Months with value 24.4, followed by Giovanni Ferrero, and Giorgio Armani. Down to Month Ennio Doris with the lowest value 3.3.
Over the past 10 Months, the Wealth in billion U.S. dollars has declined.
Considered together, the average Wealth in billion U.S. dollars in all 10 Months is roughly 10.03.
Summing up the values of all Months, we get total 100.3.
